field.name: summary
field.value: Make helpers access the current context via the controller rather than HttpContext.Current

field.name: description
field.value:
This is related to the other issues I've raised regarding testing controllers via injecting a mocked IRailsEngineContext. Currently, the AbstractHelper class offers a static CurrentContext property which simply returns HttpContext.Current. This is a problem for testing, as the "context injection" style of testing doesn't have an HttpContext. Since the helpers all have access to the current controller, I would like to make them access the IRailsEngineContext on the controller instead.
The specific scenario I'm encountering this problem is testing a controller action which is using the PaginationHelper.CreateCachedPagination method. This in turn attempts to access the CurrentContext.....
The main issue with this is that any helper method using the context can no longer be marked as static. I don't know enough about the effects of this so I'm raising this issue before supplying a patch.
